mapper.select: select dataID,productInnerId,productActualID,productURL,productName,productDescription,shelveDate,weight,origin,province,city,category,specialtyCategory,brand,factoryName,factoryAddress,series,specification,deliveryStartArea,productPrice,productPromPrice,monthSaleCount,commentCount,storeActualID,storeName,storeURL,shopkeeper,companyName,storeLocation,expirationDay,produceDay,productPromotionID,productCompleteID,category1,category2,category3,goodCommentCount,midCommentCount,badCommentCount,SaleCount,goodCommentRate,category4,taxRate,productHighVipPrice,productLowVipPrice,productTax,pictureCommentCount,additionCommentCount,keyword,website,extractTime,analyzeTime,errorInfo,TaskDataID from data order by dataId limit #{size},#{offset}
